jdbcService.sql: select ac.name, an1.name as anchor, an2.name as target_anchor, ac.icon, ac.mixin, null, ac.id from component_anchor an1 join component_anchor_action aa on an1.id = aa.component_anchor_id join component_anchor an2 on aa.target_anchor_id = an2.id join component_action ac on ac.id = aa.component_action_id where an1.component_template_id = :templateId
